bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Willard D. Mayer, May 15, 1951

div1.p: Hench thanks Mayer for the photograph of the Carlos J. Finlay Memorial in Panama City.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Willard D. Mayer, May 15, 1951
div1.opener:
Y F
May 15, 1951
Dr. Willard D. Mayer
510 Kales Building
Detroit, Michigan
My dear Doctor Mayer:
div1.p:
Thank you very kindly indeed for
sending me the photograph of the memorial to Dr.
Carlos Finlay. I am very glad to have it.

I am collecting as much data as I can
not only about Walter Reed and his colleagues
but also about Finlay and shall put this in my
file on Finlay. The next time I go to Panama
I shall try to remember to look it up.

I enjoyed my evening in Detroit very
much.
div1.closer: Sincerely yours, P. S. Hench, M. D. PSH:alc
